name: agneto-dashboard-workspace
description: Team Agneto Dashboard â€” monorepo workspace (backend + frontend)

scripts.dev: concurrently --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.start: concurrently --names "backend,frontend" --prefix-colors "cyan,magenta" "cd backend && npm start" "cd frontend && npm start"
scripts.install:all: cd backend && npm install && cd ../frontend && npm install
